headline: LYV, DKNG, SPOT: Bernstein Selects the Best Entertainment Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: 1975 was a landmark year for film, with blockbusters like Jaws, One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest, and The Rocky Horror Picture Show dominating the box office, while cult favorites like Daisy Miller and Hard Times inspired generations of creatives. But as cultural critic Paul Skallas puts it, we now live in an age of “stuck culture,” where bold, risk-taking storytelling has largely faded from the mainstream. That said, after closely studying today’s entertainment landscape, Bernstein analyst Ian M
